<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104726</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104726</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770210014</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Trigonometric Circle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trigonometrischer Kreis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cercle Trigonométrique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Círculo Trigonometric</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cerchio Trigonometrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Trigonometric κύκλος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Círculo Trigonometric</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Through this silumation, students can explore how changing the angle X of a trigonometric circle affects Sin and Cos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Durch dieses silumation können Kursteilnehmer 
erforschen, wie das Ändern des Winkels X eines trigonometrischen 
Kreises Sünde und Lattich beeinflußt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Par ce silumation, les étudiants peuvent explorer
comment changer l'angle X d'un cercle trigonométrique affecte le 
péché et le Cos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Com este silumation, os estudantes podem explorar 
como mudar o ângulo X de um círculo trigonometric afeta o sin e o 
Cos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Con questo silumation, gli allievi possono 
esplorare come cambiare l'angolo X di un cerchio trigonometrico 
interessa il sin e Cos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέσω αυτού του silumation, οι σπουδαστές μπορούν να
εξερευνήσουν πώς η αλλαγή της γωνίας Χ ενός trigonometric 
κύκλου έχει επιπτώσεις στην αμαρτία και το μαρούλι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Con este silumation, los estudiantes pueden 
explorar cómo cambiar el ángulo X de un círculo trigonometric 
afecta pecado y Lechuga romana.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:DR. DANIEL CHURCHILL
FN:DR. DANIEL CHURCHILL
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770210014</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104726</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/trigonometric-circle</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
